Class SslUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.enterprise.connector.util.SslUtil

  • public class SslUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for SSL.
    Since:
    2.8

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javax.net.ssl.HostnameVerifier setTrustingDefaultHostnameVerifier()
      Replaces the default HTTPS hostname verifier with one that trusts all hosts
      static javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory setTrustingDefaultHttpsSocketFactory()
      Replaces the default SSLSocketFactory with one that doesn't verify certificates
      static void setTrustingHttpsOptions(javax.net.ssl.HttpsURLConnection conn)
      Replaces the default TrustManager for this connection with one that trusts all certificates, and the default HostnameVerifier with one that accepts all hostnames.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setTrustingHttpsOptions

        public static void setTrustingHttpsOptions(javax.net.ssl.HttpsURLConnection conn)
                                    throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Replaces the default TrustManager for this connection with one that trusts all certificates, and the default HostnameVerifier with one that accepts all hostnames.
        Parameters:
        conn - the HTTPS URL connection
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if an error occurs setting the properties

      • setTrustingDefaultHttpsSocketFactory

        Returns:
        original socket factory

      • setTrustingDefaultHostnameVerifier

        public static javax.net.ssl.HostnameVerifier setTrustingDefaultHostnameVerifier()
        Replaces the default HTTPS hostname verifier with one that trusts all hosts
        Returns:
        original hostname verifier
